title: Simpler, Better
subTitle: Just for fun.
script: <script src='https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/medium-zoom@1.1.0/dist/medium-zoom.min.js'></script><script>var imgLinks = document.querySelectorAll('#postBody a > img'); imgLinks.forEach(function(imgLink) {var parentLink = imgLink.parentElement; parentLink.parentNode.insertBefore(parentLink.removeChild(imgLink), parentLink); parentLink.parentNode.removeChild(parentLink);}); mediumZoom('#postBody img');</script>  <script async src=
style: <style>#postBody img {display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;}</style>
